title: Launch Page Test
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user installed 'Beat The Streak Application"
AND does not have an MLB.com Account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the splash screen should load with the Beat the Streak logo
AND once the splash screen finishes loading, a user is presented with the initial screen AND should see the following:
- "Sign In" button
- "Create Account" button

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the app is launched
AND the user is brought to the Fork screen
AND the user taps the "Sign In" button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Sign In screen with the following:
- A header that reads "Sign In"
- "How To Play" button (located in the top-right corner)
- Email text field (Required)
- Password text field (Required)
- "Forgot Password?" link <Directs to the forgot password screens>
- Official Rules, Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policy links 
- "Sign In" button
- "Need an MLB.com account?" link <Directs to the Register screen>
- Text that starts with "No purchase necessary to enter or win".

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the app is launched
AND the user is brought to the Fork screen
AND the user then clicks the "Create Account" button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is taken to the "Create an MLB.com account" screen with:
- A header that reads "Register"
- "How To Play" button (located in the top-right corner)
- Email text field (Required)
- Nickname text field (Required)
- Password text field (Required)
-Confirm Password text field (Required)
- Birthday field (Required)
- Official Rules, Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policy links
- "Register" button
- "Already Have An Account?" link <Directs to the Sign In page>
- Text that starts with "No purchase necessary to enter or win".

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the app is launched and the user taps either "Sign In" or "Create Account" buttons
AND the user taps any of the following links from either "Sign In" or "Register" pages
- How to Play link
- Official Rules link
- Terms and Conditions link
- Privacy Policy link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be taken to each corresponding link that the user tapped on
AND these pages will open as web view
AND the corresponding page is displayed correctly (Verify by checking the header title of that page on top).

Check all the links

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND the user is an existing user
AND the user taps the "Sign In" button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is taken to the Sign In page with the following required fields:
- Email (Required)
- Password (Required)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user launches the app
AND the user is on the Sign In page
AND the user taps on "Forgot Password?" link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is brought to Forgot Password screen with:
- Header on top that reads "Forgot Password"
-Instructions
-"Email Address" text field
- On screen iOS keyboard
- "Back" on top left corner <Directs user back to the sign in page>

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on "Forgot Password?" screen
AND the user enters their e-mail address in the field
AND the user taps "Send" button on the keyboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user directed back to the sign in page
AND the user receives an e-mail with the reset password
AND the user is allowed to log in to BTS with the password sent in the email

NOTE: Setting a whole new password is not implemented within the app flow yet but can be done on the link sent in the email.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user tries to Register a new account
AND enters an email that's already taken
OR enters a nickname that's already taken
OR enters a birthday after October 1st 18 years ago
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN all of the proper validations are enforced:
Message appears for emails and nicknames already registered
Birthday date picker does not allow players younger than 18 during the regular season

title: My Picks Page Test
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak" Application
AND the user has an MLB .com
AND the user has never logged into "Beat the Streak"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has just created an account
AND logs in 
AND opens the My Picks page 
AND scrolls up
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will not be able to see past picks because they have not made any

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on My Picks
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following sections will display on the My Picks tab:
- The navigation dropdown will be in the upper left corner
- The logged in user's streak will appear in the top right corner
AND dates will be listed on the left
AND where there is a single pick listed
- The option to double down is listed under the single pick
OR where there is no pick
- The option to 'Select a Player'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user presses the Select a Player option for an available date
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the "MAKE A PICK" page opens
AND the user will see 3 sections accessible:
Top Picks| My Recent | Custom | All Players
AND the Top Picks and My Recent will display a Player row
AND the All Players will display a team row

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the Custom Tab
AND toggles the categories on or off
AND taps Apply or Reset
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the Custom Filter Tab
AND the user will reach a page with filtered results yielding players that fall within the specific category OR the user will face a no result screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a new user logs into the app on a newly created account
AND is on the My Picks page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN when they attempt to scroll up they will not be able to see past picks because they have not made any
AND all previous days will appear in gray text

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user clicks on the 'Make a Pick' cell for today
And the user selects a player from the Top Picks tab on the the Make a Pick page
And taps on the 'Yes' button on the confirmation pop up
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought back to the My Picks page
AND see their pick updated on that day

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has not made a pick for the day 
AND selects the 'Make a Pick' cell for today
And taps on the 'My Recent' Tab
And the user selects a player
And taps on the 'Yes' button on the confirmation pop up
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought back to the My Picks page
AND see their pick updated on that day

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user clicks on the 'Make a Pick' cell for today
AND taps on the 'All Teams' Tab
AND tap on any team
AND tap on any player
AND taps on the 'Yes' button on the confirmation pop up
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought back to the My Picks page
AND see their pick updated on that day

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has submitted 1 pick for the day 
AND never used double down feature 
AND taps on the 'Double Down' cell for that day
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see the Double Down confirmation that says:

"Want to Double Down?
Pick two players on any day to try to grow your streak by two.
But it's risky - if either player fails to get a hit, your streak will go back to ZERO."

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has submitted 1 pick for the day 
AND has used the double down feature 
AND the user taps on the 'Double Down' cell for that day
AND the user selects a player, then taps 'Yes' on the confirmation
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought back to the My Picks page
AND see their pick updated on that day

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps double down 
AND selects a player as their first pick with a double header scheduled for that day
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the pick should be submitted as expected
AND on the my picks page will show the same player for both double down picks
AND the lock time will be the same for both picks
AND the lock time will be the lock time of the earlier game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the existing pick or 'Edit' link for a given day with only 1 pick already selected
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is brought to the 'Remove Pick' page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the existing pick or 'Edit' link for a given day with a double down pick already selected 
AND then taps on the remove pick button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be brought back to the my picks page with the selected pick removed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps their second pick of the day that is also a double down pick of a player in a doubleheader 
AND then taps the remove button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN that pick will be removed from my picks page
AND that user will return the my picks page
The original single pick of that player should still remain

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on Make a Pick view and taps on the 'More' button for a player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is taken to the Player Detail Pick screen
AND will see the player on the left
AND the probable pitcher on the right
AND see the player's stats against the pitcher at the bottom
AND see the player's season stats
AND the button on the bottom will say 'Submit Pick'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the my picks page
AND taps on a date in the future
AND taps on Teams
AND taps on a team that does not have a probable pitcher
AND taps on any player ('More' button)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Player Details View
AND will see the players picture the the left
AND see the opposing team's logo to the right
AND see the player's stats vs the opposing team at the bottom
AND see the player's season stats below that
AND the button on the bottom will say 'Submit Pick'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the single pick that has not been scored yet
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is taken to the Player Detail Pick screen
AND will see the player on the left
AND the probable pitcher on the right
AND see the player's stats against the pitcher at the bottom
AND the player's season stats
AND the button on the bottom will say 'Remove Pick'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the my picks page
AND taps on the player who does not have an associated probable pitcher
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Player Details View
AND will see the players picture the the left
AND see the opposing team's logo to the right
AND see the player's stats vs the opposing team at the bottom
AND see the player's season stats below that
AND the button on the bottom will say 'Remove Pick'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on a date with 2 picks selected that are still not scored or locked
AND the user taps on either one of the picks for that date
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is taken to the Player Detail Pick screen
AND will see the player on the left
AND the probable pitcher on the right
AND see the player's stats against the pitcher at the bottom
AND the player's season stats
AND the button on the bottom will say 'Remove Pick'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on a date with 2 picks selected that are still not scored or locked
AND they do not have a probable pitcher 
AND then the user taps on either one of the picks for that date
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Player Details View
AND will see the players picture the the left
AND see the opposing team's logo to the right
AND see the player's stats vs the opposing team at the bottom
AND see the player's season stats below that
AND the button on the bottom will say 'Remove Pick'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a player is on the My Picks page that was selected on a day in which their team has a double header scheduled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a label will display for which game the player was chosen for (Game 1 / Game 2)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the my picks page before their picked player's team lock time
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see their pick
AND the pick has a time stamp that reads "player locks at (time: X:XX) PM ET"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the my picks page after their picked player's team lock time
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see their pick get locked
AND it will state 'Pick Locked At X:XX PM ET'
AND if the user had not selected a Double Down option, that section will be removed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on Top Picks/ Recent Picks/ All Teams page before lock time 
AND has already made a pick for the day
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see their pick as unlocked

    "Player Locks at XX:XX PM ET"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the My Picks page 
AND has not selected a player and all the games for that particular date are locked
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will NOT see 'Select a player' text in the date cell

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has made picks the past 2 days and is on the My Picks page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the past 2 days of picks at the top

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has made no picks the past 10 days and is on the My Picks page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the first date they will see at the top will be today's

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user changes timezone to one other than ET and view the My Picks page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see the correct dates show properly with all game times set to ET

title: Pick Scoring Test
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the Beat the Streak app installed 
AND the user has created an account
GIVEN for the later portion of these tests, user should have At Bat installed as well

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user makes a pick, before the game has been scored 
AND the player recorded a hit during the game and after the game has been scored
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's streak should advance by one

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user makes a pick, before the game has been scored 
AND the player did not record a hit during the game and after the game has been scored
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's streak is over and should revert back to zero

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user makes a pick, before the game has been scored 
AND the player did not record a hit during the game and after the game has been scored 
AND the user has used the mulligan
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user keeps their streak but it does not advance by any amount, the pick will indicate that the mulligan has been used AND the user's profile will now show mulligan as used

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user makes a pick, before the game has been scored 
AND the player did not bat during the game and after the game has been scored.
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user keeps their streak but it does not advance by one, the pick cell will indicate that the player did not have any at bats

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user makes a double down pick, after the game has been scored and both picks got a hit
AND the player did not record a hit during the game and after the game has been scored
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's streak should advance by two

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user makes a double down pick, 
AND only one of the players recorded a hit during the games and after the games has been scored 
AND the user does not have a Mulligan available for the streak
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak is over 
AND the user's streak should revert back to zero

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user makes a double down pick
AND neither players recorded a hit during the games and after the games has been scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak is over 
AND the user's streak should revert back to zero

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user makes a double down pick
AND one player recorded a hit during the game and after the game has been scored 
AND one player did not have a at bat during the game and after the game has been scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak should advance by one, the user should be able to see the batter results for the one who recorded a hit 
AND text indicating that the other pick did not have an at bat

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a user makes a double down pick
AND only one of the players recorded a hit during the games and after the games has been scored 
AND the user used the mulligan
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user's streak will not increment and the user will see "mulligan save" for both picks

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has a streak in progress 
AND the user does not make a pick for the day of games and all of the day's games have been processed and the next day is available for selection
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user's streak will be maintained 
AND they will be able to resume it when they make a their next pick

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the picked player cell where the player's team is in a live game state 
AND the user is a Lite user in At Bat
AND the user taps on Follow in At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to At Bat
AND the user should be taken into gameday and straight to the Box tab.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the picked player cell where the player's team is in a live game state 
AND the user is a Full user in At Bat
AND the user taps on Follow in At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to At Bat
AND the user should be taken into gameday and straight to the Game tab.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the picked player cell where the player's team is in a final game state 
AND the pick has not been scored
AND the user taps on Follow in At Bat
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to At Bat
AND the user should be taken into gameday and straight to the Wrap tab.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a pick that has been scored
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to a scoring breakdown of the player
AND each of the Innings where the player was at bat will display
AND the Pitcher at the time will be listed
AND the At Bat result will be listed
AND the Follow in At Bat will be listed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a pick where the player has highlights for that specific game 
AND those highlights are of the player recording a hit
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a link will appear "Watch (PLAYERNAME) highlights"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a pick where the player has highlights for that specific game 
AND those highlights are NOT of the player recording a hit
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no video link appears

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a pick where the player has no highlights for that specific game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no video link appears

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on "Watch (PLAYERNAME) highlights"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be brought to a webview where there is a MLB.com video search results with that player's name pre-populated as the search criteria

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a player result
AND the user taps on Follow in At Bat 
AND does not have At Bat installed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN they user sees a Get At Bat Go download At Bat from the app store prompt
AND Cancel button
AND Continue button
AND Cancel caches the AT Bat redirection
AND Continue button brings you to At Bat page of the App Store

title: Live At Bat Follow Test
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has "Beat The Streak" installed
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into the "Beat the Streak" application

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a picked players cell
AND the user taps on the picked player cell
AND the picked player's game has not yet been scored in BTS
AND the picked player's game is in a pregame state in the At Bat App
AND the user taps on the follow in At Bat button on the players page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to At Bat Application
AND the user should be taken to the game preview game day screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a picked players cell
AND the picked player's game has no yet been scored in BTS
AND the picked player's game is in a live state in the At Bat Application
AND the user is a Lite user in At Bat.
AND the user taps on the follow in At Bat button on the players page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to At Bat Application
AND the user should be taken into GameDay
And straight into the boxscore tab for the picked player's game.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a picked players cell
AND the picked player's game has not yet been scored in BTS
AND the picked player's game is in a live state in the At Bat Application
AND the user is a Full user in At Bat.
AND the user taps on the follow in At Bat button on the players page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to the At Bat Application.
AND the user should be taken into GameDay and straight to the game tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a picked players cell
AND the picked player's game has not yet been scored in BTS
AND the picked player's game is in a Final state in the At Bat app
AND the user taps on the follow in At Bat button on the players page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be transported to At Bat Application
AND the user should be taken into GameDay 
AND straight to the Wrap tab for the picked player's game.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on a picked players cell
AND the picked player's game has been scored in BTS
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to a scoring breakdown of the player
AND each of the Innings where the player was at bat will display
AND the Pitcher at the time will be listed
AND the At Bat result will be listed
AND the Follow in At Bat will be listed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user does not have At Bat Installed
AND the user taps on a player row
OR taps on view next on a player row
AND pick result page is opened for that player
AND tap on Follow in At Bat button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN they user sees a Get At Bat Go download At Bat from the app store prompt
AND Cancel button
AND Continue button
AND Cancel caches the AT Bat redirection
AND Continue button brings you to At Bat page of the App Store

title: Leaderboard Test
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has "Beat The Streak" installed
AND the user has an MLB.com account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is on the Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see sections in the segmented controller at the top:
Current Streak (*this season year*) | Season Streak (*this season year*) | Batting Average (*this season year*) | Pick Average (*this season year*) | MLB All-Time | BTS All-Time | Friends | Groups

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects the Groups Leaderboard 
AND the user has no MLB Groups created
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN no leaderboard will display
AND the following message will display: "This leaderboard is unavailable. Create groups by selecting the Groups tab in the Navigation menu. Press the + button to create/join a group"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the overall tab at the top, scrolls down 
AND there are more than 25 results on that particular leaderboard page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the first 25 results will load
AND when you get to the bottom of the list the next 25 results will load
AND will continue until there are no more results

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Leaderboard Overall Tab 
AND taps on the arrow to the right of the Current Season header
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Overall Leaderboard will change from 'Current Season' standings to the 'BTS All Time' standings
AND pressing the arrow again will change the Overall Leaderboard from 'BTS All Time' to 'MLB Hit Streaks'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Leaderboard Overall Tab 
AND the user taps on the leaderboard header name
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Overall Leaderboards options menu
AND the user will see the followin options to choose from:

Current Streak (2018)
Season Streak (2018)
Batting Average (2018)
Pick Average (2018)
MLB All-Time
BTS All-Time
Friends
Groups

AND there will be a Done option in the top left to return to the Overall Leaderboard
AND a check will appear next to the Overall Leaderboard they were on at the time the menu was opened

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Leaderboard Overall Tab 
AND the user taps on Current Season Overall Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of user standings will appear for the Current Season
AND the list of users will appear in Rank Ascending / Season Streak Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above the standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the 'BTS All Time' Overall Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of user standings will appear for all BTS seasons
AND the list of users will appear in Season Streak Descending order
AND the year of the streak will be displayed
AND the current logged in user's best streak stats will appear above the standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the 'MLB Hit Streak' Overall Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a list of MLB players will appear
AND the list will show the each player's longest hit streaks
AND the list will be sorted by Hit Streak Descending order
AND the year the streak occurred will be displayed
AND the current logged in user's best streak stats will appear above the standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the Friends leaderboard but is not logged into facebook
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the leaderboard list will not populate
AND the following message will display: "This leaderboard is unavailable. Log into Facebook to access this feature"
AND a Facebook connect button will display below the message

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the Friends leaderboard but is logged into facebook
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of the user's Facebook friends' standings will appear for the Current Season
AND the list of players will appear in Rank Ascending / Season Streak Descending order
AND the current logged in user's stats will appear above Friends' standings

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the 'Invite Friends' tab underneath the segmented controller
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see 4 options:

Facebook
Twitter
Email
Text Message

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the 'Invite Friends' tab without having a carrier connection
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see 4 options:

Facebook
Twitter
Email
Text Message

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Invite Friends tab
AND the user taps the Facebook button 
AND the user shares their post
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the post on facebook will be as expected
AND when the link in the facebook post is tapped then it will link to the app store

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Invite Friends tab, 
AND the user taps the email button
AND the user enters ands sends a valid email (with email properly configured on the device)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the email should be sent to the entered email address
AND in that email when the link is tapped will bring the user to the app store

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Invite Friends tab
AND the user taps text message button
AND the user enters and sends a valid message (with text messaging properly configured on the device)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the receiving number will receive a text
AND when that user taps on the link it will open up to the app store

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Invite Friends tab
AND the user taps Twitter button
AND the user enters and submits a valid tweet (with Twitter properly configured on the device)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the tweet will be posted to the users twitter account
AND when the user taps on the link in the tweet the app store will open

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Invite Friends tab 
AND the user attempts to invite friends using email, text or Twitter without having set up accounts
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see a message saying:

"Sharing Unavailable Sharing BTS content requires that you enable the appropriate accounts on your device. Go to your Settings application to set this up"

title: Settings/Misc Test
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has "Beat the Streak" installed
AND has an MLB.com account
AND has logged into "Beat the Streak" Application

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user goes into the setting tab 
AND the user taps the logout button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is logged out 
AND the user brought to the login screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on the following cells from the Settings tab:

How to Play
Prizes
Official Rules
Terms and Conditions
Privacy Policy
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will be taken to a web view of the corresponding subject

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens the app with the 'Force upgrade' option enabled via config
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN they should receive a pop up dialog that does not allow them to use the app
AND their only way of bypassing the the dialog would be to upgrade the app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens the app with the maintenance flag set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will see a notification that BTS is under maintenance

GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user attempts to turn on a notification

AND in http://qa.mlb.com, there should be post calls for all notifications turned on and off
AND in the Request it should contain a pushId, the deviceId, CampaignCode, apiKey, OS, and push setting
AND each new notification request (whether turning on a notification on or off) should send a new Post call.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has turned on the reminders notification alert
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should receive a reminder alert asking user to make a pick at a predefined time (usually around 11 AM) in the morning

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should see a notification on their device: "(USERTEAMNAME) extended their streak to 7. Make your pick(s) now to stake your claim in (GROUPNAME)"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user's pick has recorded a single in a live game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification on their device:
(Top/Bottom) (Inning Number) : (Player Name) hit a (noun related to hit type).
Ex: Top 6: Pablo Sandoval hit a single.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user's pick has recorded a double in a live game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification on their device:
(Top/Bottom) (Inning Number) : (Player Name) hit a (noun related to hit type).
Ex: Bot 3: Josh Donaldson hit a double.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user's pick has recorded a triple in a live game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification on their device:
(Top/Bottom) (Inning Number) : (Player Name) hit a (noun related to hit type).

(Test for Scoring, Reminder and Groups)

title: Creating/Editing Groups
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"

AND the user has logged into "Beat The Streak"

For more details and designs:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=36733220

custom_steps_separated.content:

AND navigates to the groups view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the groups home default screen appears with a "Join or Create Group" button

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the group option action sheet appears with "Create a New Group" and "Join an Existing Group"

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Create New Group form appears

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user leaves all the fields blank and taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message appears that the group requires a name

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills in only the Group Name
AND leaves Description empty 
AND sets Private Off. 
AND taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the group is created successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills in the Group Name 
AND the Description
AND sets Private Off
AND taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the group is created successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills in only the Group Name
AND the description 
AND sets Private On. 
AND taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message appears that private groups require a password

AND the description 
AND sets Private On.

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message appears that the passwords do not match

AND the description 
AND sets Private On. 
AND enters a password with a matching confirmation password
AND taps "Done" or "Create Group"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the group is created successfully

AND taps "Save Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the group is saved

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form for a public group
AND changes the Private setting to On
AND taps "Save Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message appears that a password is required

WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form for a public group
AND changes the Private setting to On. 
AND adds a password to the Password field but not to the confirm password field
AND taps "Save Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a message appears that the passwords do not match

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form for a public group
AND changes the Private setting to On. 
AND adds a matching passwords to the password and confirm password fields
AND taps "Save Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the group is saved as a private group 
(Confirm by trying to join the group as another user)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Group Edit form for a private group
AND changes the Private setting to Off 
AND taps "Save Changes"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the group is saved as a public group 
(Confirm by trying to join the group as another user)

title: Leaderboards (User oriented)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into "Beat The Streak"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates through the Leaderboards section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should see a Leaderboard for "Hits"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user reviews the "Hits" leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should see a list of users sorted by the total number of successful BTS picks (see additional steps for specific instances)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user reviews the "Hits" leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should see a list of users sorted by the total number of successful BTS picks

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user reviews the "Hits" leaderboard for a qualifying user that has only achieved a streak of 1

(note: if the user is not high enough ranked to qualify for the top 50, try to locate a similar user - one that has built only one streak)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN that user will be shown on this leaderboard with 1 for their hits

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user reviews the "Hits" leaderboard for a qualifying user that has only achieved a streak of 1 and then lost their streak back down to 0

(note: if the user is not high enough ranked to qualify for the top 50, try to locate a similar user - one that has built only one streak but it is now broken without a new one started)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN that user will be shown on this leaderboard with 1 for their hits

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user reviews the "Hits" leaderboard for a qualifying user that has only achieved a streak of 1 and then lost their streak back down to 0. Afterwards, that same user has started a new streak of 1

(note: if the user is not high enough ranked to qualify for the top 50, try to locate a similar user - one that has built a streak, broke it and has begun a new one)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN that user will be shown on this leaderboard with 2 for their hits

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user reviews the "Hits" leaderboard for a qualifying user that has triggered a mulligan
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN that user will be shown on this leaderboard with the correct number of successful BTS picks for the season, having used the mulligan should not incorrectly increase or decrease their total

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user continues to navigate through leaderboards section
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should see a Leaderboard for "Player Results"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user reviews the "Player Results" leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should see a list of users sorted by the highest percent of hits per at bats of their BTS picks (see additional steps for specific instances)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user reviews the "Player Results" leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should see the averages formatted as .###, there should be no instances of "0.###" or more than 3 decimal places

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user reviews the "Player Results" leaderboard after making a pick for today's games
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should only see averages of scored picks, i.e. the pick made for today's games will not have impacted the listed average

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user reviews the "Player Results" leaderboard after today's picks have been scored
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they should only see averages of scored picks including the results of the picks just recently scored

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user reviews the "Player Results" leaderboard for a user whose picks have accumulated fewer than 3.1 * 50% * (game dates since Opening Day) plate appearances
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN that particular user should not appear on the player results leaderboard because they do not meet the minimum qualifications

custom_expected:

AND the batter will have 1- (Amount of Batting opportunities the batter has) next to their name.

AND the user has at least one Batter picked
custom_steps:

AND The batter has 1 Hit
AND The Batter has 0 Hits
custom_expected:

AND the batter will have 1- (Amount of Batting opportunities the batter has) next to their name.
AND the batter will have 0 - (Amount of Batting opportunities the batter has) next to their name.

[Streak will Reset to 0 if batter(s) fail to get a hit, Streak will increase by 1 if batter gets a hit, Streak will return to 0 if on batter gets a hit and the second batter does not in a double down play, Streak will increase by 2 if both batters record a hit in a double down play)

title: Push Notification- Turn Notifications On
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN The user has turned on Push Notifications
Either in the on boarding flow
OR
WHEN the user has gone to Settings and tapped on the Checkboxes
custom_expected:
THEN the notification should appear as "ON
AND in http://qa.mlb.com, there should be a POST call for all notifications turned on
AND in the Request it should contain a pushId, the deviceId, CampaignCode, apiKey, OS, and push setting.

title: Push Notifications- 1941 Notifications
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
Please contact Wilsharo Scott on the services team to enable notifications and the frequency of the notifications.
Please download the debug build of the application.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has turned on 1941 Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should receive push notifications related to 1941 Notifications within Beat The Streak.
(As of 04/2016 the only news & promotions users should see is related to Joe DiMaggio and what he did on each day of his streak, this will change)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has turned off 1941 Notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not receive any notifications based on the 1941 Notifications

title: Push Notification- Reminders
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN The user has turned on the "Pick Reminder" Alert in the on boarding flow
OR
The User has checked off the Reminders check box in the Settings Menu under the Notifications Section
custom_expected:
THEN in http://qa.mlb.com or http://qa2.mlb.com, there should be post calls for the notification
AND in the Request it should contain a pushId, the deviceId, CampaignCode, apiKey, OS, and push setting
AND in Push Setting it should show, [{"channels":{"channel.bts":{"events":["bts.reminder"]}}}]

title: Push Notification- Player Results
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"

custom_steps: WHEN The User has checked off the Results check box in the Settings Menu under the Notifications Section
custom_expected:

AND in the Request it should contain a pushId, the deviceId, CampaignCode, apiKey, OS, and push setting
AND in Push Setting it should show, [{"channels":{"channel.bts":{"events":["bts.final.game.scored"]}}}]

title: Push Notification- Streaks

title: Push Notification- Pick Hits
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"
AND the user has an MLB.com Account
AND the user has logged into "Beat The Streak"
custom_steps:
WHEN a user has notifications turned on
AND a User's pick(s) has recorded a Single in a Live Game
AND a User's pick(s) has recorded a Double in a Live Game
AND a User's pick(s) has recorded a Triple in a Live Game
AND a User's pick(s) has recorded a Home Run in a Live Game
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive a notification on their device:
(Top/Bottom) (Inning Number) : (Player Name) hit a (noun related to hit type).
Ex: 
Top 6: Pablo Sandoval hit a Single.
Bot 3: Josh Donaldson hit a Double.
Top 7: Jacoby Ellsbury hit a Triple.
Bot 8: Giancarlo Stanton hit a homerun.

title: Push Notification- Push Notifications off

OR
WHEN the user Goes to settings and unchecks all of the boxes under the Notifications Section
custom_expected:
THEN the notification should appear as OFF"

AND in the Request it should contain a pushId, the deviceId, CampaignCode, apiKey, OS, and push setting

title: Fast Track Regression
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed "Beat The Streak"
AND the user does not have an MLB.com Account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens the "Beat The Streak" application.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should land on the home splash screen with two buttons
Sign in | Create Account

IF in the off season, a popup shows up that says, "Thanks for playing, Beat The Streak will return in [the next year]"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps Create Account
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the MLB.com register form will pop up.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills out the form
AND taps the register button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is now registered to MLB.com
AND has an MLB.com account
AND will be redirected to My Picks.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on Sign In
AND when the user fills out the form with valid credentials
AND the user taps on sign in.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is redirected to the Sign In page
AND the user is logged into the application
AND redirected to the My Picks page.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to make a pick
AND taps the "+"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will get redirected to the Make a Pick screen for the day
AND there should be 4 categories: Top Picks | My Recent | Custom | All Players
IF using a brand new user account, My Recent picks should be empty.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to select a player
AND taps the "i" next to the player in trending players
AND taps submit pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the player page
AND the player page will display stats versus the probably pitcher
IF there is no probable pitcher, the page will display player stats vs team.
AND the player page will display season stats.
AND there will be a popup that ask "Submit Pick, Are you sure you want to submit your pick?"
IF user selects yes, the user will be redirected to the My Picks page with the player appearing as the pick for the day.
IF user selects no, then the user will stay on the page where the player is

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to select a player
AND taps the player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN there will be a popup that ask "Submit Pick, Are you sure you want to submit your pick?"
IF user selects yes, the user will be redirected to the My Picks page with the player appearing as the pick for the day.
IF user selects no, then the user will stay on the page where the player is

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on Custom in the Make a Pick page
AND the user taps on a filters
AND the user taps on apply
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will get a list of picks that match the criteria of the filters.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on Custom in the Make a Pick page
AND the user taps on a filters
AND the user taps on apply
AND the user taps on Reset
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should see the custom filters emptied
AND reset.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to remove the player before the players game is locked
AND taps edit
AND taps remove pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the player page
AND the player page will display stats versus the probably pitcher
IF there is no probable pitcher, the page will display player stats vs team.
AND the player page will display season stats
AND a pop up will occur when remove pick is tapped
IF user selects yes, the user will be redirected to the My Picks page with the player removed as the pick for the day.
IF user selects no, then the user will stay on the page where the player is

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to make a double down pick
AND already has a player selected for the day
AND taps double down
AND then taps a player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the player categories 
AND there should be 4 categories: Top Picks | My Recent | Trending | All Players
AND a popup will appear and ask if the user wants to submit the pick
AND the user will be redirected to the My Picks page with the two picks submitted for the day.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user wants to remove a double down pick
AND the user has two players picked for the day
AND the user taps the player or edit next to the player
AND the user taps remove pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is redirected to the players page
AND then the user faces a pop up that ask if the user is sure they want to remove the player
IF user selects yes, the user will be redirected to the My Picks page with the player removed as the pick for the day.
IF user selects no, then the user will stay on the page where the player is

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the hamburger button to the top left
AND the user selects Leaderboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will open the side menu
AND the user will be redirected to the leaderboard page where there are 6 options
Current Streak (Current Year) | Season Streak (Current Year) | MLB All-Time | BTS All-Time | Friends | Groups

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user selects any user
AND goes to friends 
AND tap's Facebook Connect
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to the users profile page
AND IF the user has already connected to Facebook then the users friends on Facebook will appear
IF the user has not connected to Facebook then there will be a Facebook connect button
AND once the button is tapped the steps to connect to Facebook appear.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the top left hamburger
AND taps profile
AND taps see all next to achievements
AND taps see all next to recent picks
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the side menu opens up
AND the user gets redirected to the profile page
AND the user gets redirected to the Achievements page
AND on the achievements page there are two filters (Prizes | Badges)
AND recent picks will show all recent picks the user has made.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the top left hamburger
AND taps Groups
AND taps a group in the popular section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the side menu pops up 
AND the user is sent to the groups landing page
AND the user will be redirected to the group's page where on the top is the user stats and then below is the groups stats.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the "+" or Join or Create Group button
AND the user selects join an existing group
AND joins an open group
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is shown a popup where it ask "Join An Existing Group" or "Create a new group"
AND the user is redirected to a search page where they can look for an existing group
IF the group is public then the user can join
IF the group is private then the user has to enter a password before joining.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the "+" or Join or Create Group button
AND the user selects create a new group

WHEN the user fills out the form
AND opts to make the group public
AND taps Create Group
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the group will be made 
AND anybody can join the group (Confirm with a different MLB account)
AND the user is redirected to the groups page with the current created group on top

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user fills out the form
AND opts to make the group private
AND fills in a password and confirming that password 
AND taps Create Group
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the group will be made
AND The user will be redirected to the groups page with the current group on top
AND if another user wants to join, they must put the password in to join the group (confirm with a different MLB.com account)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps into the group
AND taps the invite button on the top right
AND the user taps each option
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the share pop up shows up with options to share the group; Facebook | Twitter | Email | Message
AND Facebook will open up a Facebook App Request popup that will show the users suggested friends to invite to BTS
AND Twitter will open a pop up and ask to post the link to BTS on your timeline.
AND Email will open a crafted email with the link to join BTS.
AND Message will open a crafted message with a link to join BTS.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the 3 dots next to the invite button in the group
AND taps Leave this Group
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN a popup will appear that ask if you want to leave this group
IF the user select's leave this group, the user will be removed from the group and redirected to the groups page
IF the user select's cancel, the user stays on the group page.

title: User is able to Launch app successfully and all areas of the app are optimized to support the iPhone X screen.
custom_preconds: ASSUMING a user has an iPhone X
custom_steps: WHEN the user download and launches the Beat the Streak app
custom_expected:
THEN the app launches successfully and the all the areas of the app is optimized to support iPhone X screen display
Verify the following areas:
- The splash screen is displayed fully and optimized edge to edge
- Log In Screen
- Register Screen
- My pick page
- Leaderboard page
- Groups page
- Contests page
- Profile page
- Contacts us page
- Official rules page
- Prizes page
- Tutorial page
- FAQ's page
- Settings page
